snippet.title: 【Demo Available!】The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily Trailer
snippet.description:
『The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily』 Scheduled for Spring of 2025
Become the worlds first Streamer and cast the storm of revolution to the Empire!
A demo where you can play the early stages of the game is now available!

Play here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3338540/


This game is a dramatic strategy game controling a rebelion lead by a Villainess.
Dominate the battlefield with your streams and drop the revolution on the Empire.

Scheduled for release in Spring of 2025
Wishlist the game!




The Great Villainess: Strategy of Lily

Official website: https://alliance-arts.co.jp/villainess/en/
Genre: Crowd controlling liberation strategy
Platform: PC (Steam)
Steam store page: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2454960/_/

Developers: WSS playground, oneoreight
Publisher: Alliance Arts https://x.com/AllianceArtsEN

Spring 2025
